sentences.sContent: But if you backslide, Hiram says, “Start over.
sentences.sContent_eng: But if you backslide, Hiram says, “Start over.
sentences.sCn: 但假如你倒退了，海勒姆说，“那就重新开始。

sentences.sContent: The national economy, meanwhile, is continuing to backslide.
sentences.sContent_eng: The national economy, meanwhile, is continuing to backslide.
sentences.sCn: 美国经济，在此期间，正在继续倒退。

sentences.sContent: You've done a good job in the exam, I hope you won't backslide.
sentences.sContent_eng: You've done a good job in the exam, I hope you won't backslide.
sentences.sCn: 你考试考得不错，我希望你不要退步。

synos.tran: 堕落（过去式backslid，过去分词backslid，现在分词backsliding，第三人称单数backslides，名词backslider）；退步；背离宗教

words.tran: 想改掉坏习惯，但改了一段时间后又恢复老习惯的人

trans.tranOther: to start doing the bad things that you used to do, after having improved your behaviour
